thread.title_full: Jayam Ravi Sayeesha Saigal Vanamagan teaser to release at 6 pm on Monday February 6 2017 - Tamil Movie News

title: Jayam Ravi Sayeesha Saigal Vanamagan teaser to release at 6 pm on Monday February 6 2017 - Tamil Movie News
text: Actor Jayam Ravi's 'Bogan' that released on Thursday this week has been doing great business at the box office with positive reviews flowing in from all sides. At this time of prosperity comes another good news for the tall actor's fans. The teaser of his next film 'Vanamagan' will be released at 6 PM on Monday (February 6, 2017). 'Vanamagan' is a mega budget project directed by Vijay after the super hit 'Devi'. Jayam Ravi plays a tribal in this film. Bollywood beauty Sayeesha Saigal makes her Tamil debut playing the female lead in this film. The technical crew includes stalwarts like music director Harris Jayaraj, cinematographer Thiru and Editor Antony.
